snippet.title: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - "Eldfjall Island" Trailer - OUT NOW
snippet.description:
OUT on October 22nd, 2020 on all platforms!*

Welcome to Lonely Mountains: Downhill "ELDFJALL ISLAND"!
Descend an undiscovered island & explore the biggest mountain we've created so far:

Features:

→  New routes: Four new trails await you, including new beautiful resting spots.
→  New special effects: Ride through the thunder storm or find your way along an erupting volcano.
→  Satisfy your inner viking and unlock unique outfits, helmets and paint jobs.
→  Upgrade your existing outfits with the new pro helmet.
→  Complete your fashion style with new unlockable backpacks. 

---
Steam LMD: http://lonelymountains.com/steam


Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1256740/Lonely_Mountains_Downhill__Eldfjall_Island/
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/lonely-mountains-downhill-eldfjall-island/9np1nrzf1q5z?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/lonely-mountains-downhill-switch/
PS4: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/lonely-mountains-downhill-ps4/



Talk to the devs on Discord: https://discord.gg/lonelymountains

---
FOLLOW Lonely Mountains: Downhill
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/LonelyMnts
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LonelyMountains
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/lonelymnts
Website: https://www.lonelymountains.com


---
* COMING ON STEAM, NINTENDO SWITCH, XBOX ONE. PLAYSTATION 4 a few days later.!
